title: [GAMEPLAY] Elise Does Not Use Spider Form Quotes
body: Whenever I play {{champion:60}} Elise she only uses her human quotes, even in spider form, although when in spider form she is supposed to have scarier quotes and a different voice. It seems to be every single game so if anyone would like to try and recreate it just try playing Elise. Her Spider form is bugged.

replies.body:
Hey Dethkilr! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve this ASAP!
